name: The Village of Forgotten Things
description:
The Village of Forgotten Things is a short first-person exploration game about finding lost objects for the residents of a very forgetful village.

This game was created as an entry for the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #2 from July 4th to July 11th. This game was developed in a short amount of time (between work and studying for interviews) using Unity. 

Please enjoy! Feedback is always appreciated!
